allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Redesign sponsors layout and minimize footer

Sponsors Layout - Desktop/Tablet:
- Position sponsors centered between MYTHOS logo and date
- Sponsors fade out with other hero content on scroll
- Move to fixed bottom-right badge after 30% scroll
- Smooth opacity transitions

Sponsors Layout - Mobile:
- Split sponsors to opposite top corners
- Bayvista: top-left corner
- Nieos Grille: top-right corner
- Smaller size (35px â†’ 30px â†’ 25px â†’ 22px)
- Fade out on scroll, then appear in bottom-right badge

Scroll Behavior:
- Hero sponsors (desktop) and corner sponsors (mobile) fade out
- Fixed bottom-right badge appears after scrolling past hero
- Badge hidden near footer on all screens
- Smooth opacity transitions

Footer Minimization:
- Reduce padding: py-8 â†’ py-4
- MYTHOS title: 1.5rem â†’ 1.1rem
- Tagline: 0.85rem â†’ 0.7rem (reduced opacity to 70%)
- Social links: 0.8rem â†’ 0.7rem
- 18+ badge: 0.7rem â†’ 0.6rem (reduced opacity to 60%)
- Tighter spacing and margins throughout
- Much more compact, minimal footer design

Benefits:
- Clean sponsors integration in hero for desktop
- Unobtrusive corner placement on mobile
- Smart scroll transitions on all devices
- Minimal footer takes less screen space
- Professional, streamlined appearance

EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "Major redesign: beige/bronze palette, Helvetica Neue fonts, sharp corners

Design Changes:
- Update color palette to focus on beige (#dfd5c8) and bronze (#96694c)
- Remove all rounded corners except Get Tickets button
- Keep Get Tickets button as only rounded element on page

Typography Updates:
- Add Helvetica Neue font family with system fallbacks
- Friday date: Helvetica Neue Bold (uppercase)
- Time/location: Helvetica Neue Regular
- LINEUP heading: Helvetica Neue Bold (uppercase)
- DJ names: Helvetica Neue Bold (uppercase)
- DJ descriptions: Helvetica Neue Regular
- Plus Live Entertainment: Helvetica Neue Bold (uppercase)
- Event Details: Helvetica Neue Bold (uppercase)
- Event descriptions: Helvetica Neue Regular
- VIP Table Bookings: Helvetica Neue Bold (capitalized)
- Form labels: Helvetica Neue Regular

Section Updates:
- Lineup section: Changed to beige background
- Event Details section: Changed to beige background
- VIP Bookings section: Kept bronze background
- Sponsors section: Changed to beige background
- Footer: Changed to bronze background

Photo Updates:
- Extract photos from Website worthy.zip
- Replace all atmosphere images with new photos:
  - Lineup: 0N6A0704.jpg, 0N6A0735.jpg
  - Event Details: 0N6A0803.jpg
  - VIP Bookings: 0N6A0827.jpg, 0N6A0962.jpg
- Remove rounded corners from all images

Color Applications:
- Buttons: Bronze background with beige text
- Borders: Bronze with 30% opacity
- Text: Bronze on beige sections, beige on bronze sections
- Hover effects: Updated to use bronze colors

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>")
